snippet.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 - Official Trailer  #Fuga3 #FugaMelodiesOfSteel3
snippet.description:
The Fuga: Melodies of Steel series has reached its epic conclusion! Dive into this dramatic RPG featuring a brand-new, strategic battle system, enhanced Taranis training during intermission, and tactical route progression and event battles!

Details
Title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
Genre: Tactical RPG
Platforms: PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Nintendo Switch, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Windows
Release Date: May 29, 2025
Developed and Published by: CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.

◆Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 - Official Website: https://www.cc2.co.jp/fuga3/en
◆Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Official X: @Fuga_CC2_en https://x.com/Fuga_CC2_en

©CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.
